meanings.definition: Not related to or involving sports.
meanings.sent1: The art class focused on creating nonsporting paintings.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonsporting activities like reading and painting.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a nonsporting competition for the best cupcake decorator made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsporting approach to problem-solving was like a breath of fresh air in the office.
meanings.sent5: The nonsporting nature of the event made it unique and enjoyable for everyone involved.

meanings.definition: Not suitable for or used in sports.
meanings.sent1: The delicate china teacups were definitely nonsporting items.
meanings.sent2: He wore nonsporting shoes to the formal dinner party.
meanings.sent3: Trying to play soccer in high heels was a nonsporting decision.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsporting attire at the gym raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The nonsporting equipment was more suited for a museum than a gym.
